name: RicoShootout
description:
Ricoshootout is a 1 on 1 fighting game set in the wild wild west. With ricocheting pistol shots and evasive rolling will you be 

RicoShootout can be played 1-player against the computer or 2-player locally.

Ricoshootout is an old Wild West standoff between the sheriff and a cowboy.
Shoot, Jump, Roll and ricochet your way to victory against the cpu or your friends.

You can find the controls in game. The game has full controller support or can be played with keyboard!

Tips!

  • You can shoot upwards or downwards by tilting the stick when you fire! 
  • Use rolling or jumping to evade enemy shots and counterattack.
  • Be careful reloading, it is time consuming and leaves you vulnerable!

Amazing art and game design by:  https://keithorkeith.itch.io/
